pageProps.title: Understanding Variable Declarations in TypeScript
pageProps.metaDesc: TypeScript is a popular programming language that extends JavaScript by adding static typing and other features to enhance developer productivity and code maintainability. One of the fundamental aspects of TypeScript is variable declarations. In this article, we will dive into the world of variable declarations in TypeScript, covering their syntax, types, scoping rules, and best practices. Whether you are new to TypeScript or want to strengthen your understanding, this guide will provide you with a solid foundation.
